definitions.definition: a metal frame on which meat, fish, or vegetables are cooked outdoors over a fire:
examples: Make sure you light the barbecue in plenty of time.

definitions.definition: a meal that is prepared and eaten outdoors using such a frame, often during a party:
examples: He made some salads to have with the barbecue.

definitions.definition: a party held outdoors, during which food is cooked on a barbecue:
examples: We're having a barbecue on Saturday - I hope you can come.

definitions.definition: meat, usually pork, cooked slowly on a metal frame in a container filled with smoke, and served in a barbecue sauce
